topic.title: Pelvic And Genitourinary Assessment - conformance rules

lines.i: Qualitative assessment of condition of patient's pelvic and genitourinary region

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.118"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67531-4" Physical findings of Pelvis+Genitourinary NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10390)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD (CONF:10392), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet PelvisGenitourinaryAssessment 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.33 STATIC (CONF:10391)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.12

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.03
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67531-4" Physical findings of Pelvis+Genitourinary NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10390)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.03

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD (CONF:10392), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet PelvisGenitourinaryAssessment 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.33 STATIC (CONF:10391)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.12
